template.name: bc-full
template.value: $CONTENTTYPE$: name: $CONTENTTYPE_NAME$ slug: $CONTENTTYPE_SLUG$ singular_name: $CONTENTTYPE_SINGULAR_NAME$ singular_slug: $CONTENTTYPE_SINGULAR_SLUG$ locales: [$CONTENTTYPE_LOCALES$] title_format: '$CONTENTTYPE_TITLE_FORMAT$' description: The 'Showcases' is not particularly useful in most cases, but it does a good job of showcasing most of the available fieldtypes. fields: $CONTENTTYPE_FIELDS$ relations: $CONTENTTYPE_RELATIONS$ taxonomy: [$CONTENTTYPE_TAXONOMIES$] record_template: $CONTENTTYPE_RECORD_TEMPLATE$ record_route: $CONTENTTYPE_RECORD_ROUTE$ records_per_page: $CONTENTTYPE_RECORDS_PER_PAGE$ listing_template: $CONTENTTYPE_LISTING_TEMPLATE$ listing_records: $CONTENTTYPE_LISTING_RECORDS$ listing_sort: $CONTENTTYPE_LISTING_SORT$ sort: $CONTENTTYPE_SORT$ show_on_dashboard: $CONTENTTYPE_SHOW_ON_DASHBOARD$ show_in_menu: $CONTENTTYPE_SHOW_IN_MENU$ default_status: $CONTENTTYPE_DEFAULT_STATUS$ searchable: $CONTENTTYPE_SEARCHABLE$ singleton: $CONTENTTYPE_VIEWLESS$ icon_many: "$CONTENTTYPE_ICON_MANY$" icon_one: "$CONTENTTYPE_ICON_ONE$" order: ["$CONTENTTYPE_ICON_ORDER$"] viewless: $CONTENTTYPE_VIEW_LESS$ excerpt_format: $CONTENTTYPE_EXCERPT_FORMAT$
template.description: Insert Contenttype structure with all Contenttype's options

template.description: Insert Text Field structure with all options
